Thank you for taking the time to read our thread.

From our workstations to servers, we use Linux. We are passionate. Linux is in our name. We are LinuxFox! :santa:

Customer satisfaction is our top priority. Right from the time you contact us till you host your websites with us, we assure to help you with any aspect of your hosting account.


Here are a few more reasons to love us!

1. Proactive Monitoring: We offer proactive monitorifree with with every managed VPS. In the rare event of a failure, we get instantly notified and start working on it even before you may notice.

2. Free Offsite Backups: Enjoy complete peace of mind with free backups.

3. No Hidden Fees: We believe in complete transparency. There are no hidden fees. You pay the price that you see on our website.

4. Guaranteed 1 Gbps Bandwidth For Every VPS: Every server is connected to a dedicated 10 Gbps port to ensure high performance even during peak hours. We offer a guaranteed bandwidth of 1 Gbps for every VPS.

5. RAID-10 SSD Storage: Fault-tolerant RAID-10 SSD storage offers high reliability and complete peace of mind.

6. 30-Day Money Back Guarantee: With our 30-day money back guarantee for new customers, you can try a new VPS with no risk and decide for yourself.

7. Free Website Migration: With our website migration service, you can sit back while we migrate your existing content to your new managed VPS.

8. Advanced Security Shield: We configure and secure every VPS during deployment. After deployment, we offer managed security services to keep your VPS secure and updated.

9. Mod_Security Configuration: We install and configure mod_security during deployment to block malicious traffic to your web server. It helps to filter commonly used hacking attempts.
